message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe the product's value is worth a bit more than that. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1000000 for the product.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. What do you think?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget and the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1025000 for the product.
I see you're getting closer to my target, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $1075000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. Considering my budget and the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1050000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $1075000, Bob. I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle after all. I'm willing to make one last offer at $1075000. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.

I'm sorry to hear that, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. Considering my budget constraints, I am unable to accept your offer at $1075000. I would like to make one final offer at $1040000 for the product.
